--- create_change_stream_for_table_column.sql
CREATE CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name FOR table_name(column)

--- AST
&ast.CreateChangeStream{
  Create: 0,
  Name:   &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 21,
    NameEnd: 39,
    Name:    "change_stream_name",
  },
  Watch: &ast.ChangeStreamWatch{
    WatchTables: []*ast.ChangeStreamWatchTable{
      &ast.ChangeStreamWatchTable{
        TableName: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 44,
          NameEnd: 54,
          Name:    "table_name",
        },
        Columns: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 55,
            NameEnd: 61,
            Name:    "column",
          },
        },
        Rparen: 61,
      },
    },
    SetForAllPos: 0,
  },
  Options: (*ast.ChangeStreamOptions)(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name FOR table_name(column)
